You already selected paperless delivery

Thank you for choosing to Go Green! It may take up to two mail cycles for your updated delivery preferences to take effect. Your mailing cycle-the length of time between documents-varies by document. When the paper mailings stop, you will receive an email notification alerting you that a new document has been posted to your online account.

Note: it may take up to two mail cycles for your updated delivery preferences to take effect. Your mailing cycle-the length of time between documents-varies by document. When the paper mailings stop, you will receive an email notification alerting you that a new document has been posted to your online account.

Questions?

UnitedHealthcare Customer Service representatives are available to assist you. Please call the number on the back of your plan member ID card during the listed hours of operation.
